```lisp
(:action hunt_for_food
    :parameters (?hunter - agent ?prey - animal ?location - place)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?hunter ?location)
      (at ?prey ?location)
      (not (captured ?prey))
    )
    :effect (and
      (captured ?prey)
      (food_available ?hunter)
    )
)

(:action heat
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - resource ?location - place ?source - source)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?agent ?location)
      (at ?resource ?location)
      (at ?source ?location)
      (not (processed ?resource))
    )
    :effect (and
      (processed ?resource)
      (available ?agent)
    )
)

(:action hunt
    :parameters (?person - agent ?location - place ?resource - resource ?food - food)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?person ?location)
      (not (captured ?resource))
      (not (tested ?food))
      (has ?person ?resource)
    )
    :effect (and
      (captured ?resource)
      (has ?person ?resource)
      (tested ?food)
      (when (poisonous ?food) (alert ?person))
    )
)
```
